It gets better: If you sign up for our newsletter, you'll get this letter before everyone else.[Crickets]Is anyone even reading this thing? It’s a holiday weekend and hopefully you’re at the beach, or inside a freezing movie theater, or hosting an illegal lemonade stand. I won’t tell! And since no one’s looking, I put together a brief summer mood board for this week’s newsletter. Nothing links back to a Bon Appétit recipe, or teaches you a cooking tip, or reveals which BA staffer is a snow-cone-hating monster. And I definitely wrote this in the bathtub. My editor’s on vacation!!!Want this letter before it hits the website? Coat your insides with buttermilk ranch.
